name: Crazy Car (offmonreal)
description:
You are the driver of a small car. Your task is to collect certain plants from the islands on which the enemies are located!
Only cunning and agility you will avoid death. Be vigilant, enemies can be anywhere.
After you collect all the plants, hurry to the point of dislocation to complete the level.
And yes, you have to be a little crazy to do it all GOOD LUCK :-
